闑字的基本解释

闑
niè
门橛（古代竖在大门中央的短木）：“君入门，介拂闑。”
郭门。

闑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》魚列切，入薛，疑。］
［《廣韻》五結切，入屑，疑。］
(1)古代门中央所竖短木。
(2)指门。

闑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　闑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1339第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?魚列切，音孽。【說文】門梱。【玉篇】門欒也。【廣韻】門也，礙也。【五音集韻】門中礙也。【正韻】門中橛爲闑。【爾雅·釋宮】橛謂之闑。【禮·玉藻】君入門，介拂闑。【釋文】闑，門橛也。【儀禮·士冠禮】布席于門中闑西。【前漢·五行志】明離闑內。又【馮唐傳】闑以內，寡人制之。　又【集韻】【韻會】?倪結切，音齧。又【集韻】九芮切【正韻】居胃切，?音劂。義?同。　【集韻】或作臬槷。

vertical divider of a doorway
Basic explanation of words
vertical divider of a doorway
niè
Door prongs (a short wood erected in the center of the door in ancient times): "You are a master, and you are here."
Guomen.
vertical divider of a doorway
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guang Yun" cut the fish line, enter Xue, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" five knots cut, into chips, doubt. ]
(1) The short wood erected in the center of the ancient door.
(2) Refers to the door.
vertical divider of a doorway
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Door Character Department] 　闑; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1339 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Fish list cut, sound evil. [Said the text] The door. [Jade articles] Men Luan also. [Guang Yun] The door is also a hindrance. [Pentagram Rhyme] The door is also in the way. [Zheng Yun] The prong in the door is 闑. 【Erya·Shigong】The prong is called Zhiqi. 【Rite·Yuzao】Introduction to Jun, Jie Fuqian. 【Explanation】闑, the door prong is also. [Ritual Ceremony·Shiguan Ceremony] The cloth seat is in the door. 【Former Han·Five Elements History】Ming Liqian. Also 【Feng Tang Chuan】Within, widowhood.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Ni Jieqie, sound bite. Also 【Jiyun】Jiu Ruiqie【Zhengyun】has a stomachache,? Sounds. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or Zuo Jian.
